chinese: 这正是我所需要的.
english: This is just what I needed.

chinese: 真是个漂亮的公园,是吧?
english: It is a lovely park,isn't it?

chinese: So Simon, 告诉我你是怎么成为Boston这家饭店的餐厅经理的?
english: So tell me,Simon,how did you wind up here, a restaurant manager in Boston?

chinese: Ah! Well, 这对我来讲也有点儿像个迷.
english: Ah!Well,that's a bit of a puzzle to me,as well.

chinese: 你受过餐厅管理方面的训练吗?
english: Was your training in restaurants?

chinese: Oh no! 读完小学和中学后我上了大学.
english: Oh no!After primary and secondary schools I went to university.

chinese: Manchester. 学现代语言.
english: Manchester.Modern languages.

chinese: 那要有很多的考试.
english: That's a lot of tests.

chinese: Oh yes, 我通过了各种各样的考试.
english: Oh yes,I passed all kinds of exams.

chinese: 我考试向来不好.
english: I was never any good at taking tests.

chinese: 勉勉强强才读完小学(elementary school).
english: I barely got through elementary school.

chinese: 高中更糟.
english: High school was worse.

chinese: 过了好多年才上大学.
english: And it was years before I went to college.

chinese: 而且大学也念得不怎么好.
english: And I didn't do very well there either,I'm afraid.

chinese: Oh, 我学的还不错, 但有些东西没学到.
english: Oh,I did well,but there was something missing.

chinese: 学业完成后, 我想要一点儿经验,那种……
english: At the end of the day,I wanted experience that was...

chinese: 实践经验.
english: Hands-on.

chinese: 一点儿不错.
english: Exactly.

chinese: 想了解现实世界是怎样的.
english: Find out the way it works in the real world.

chinese: Yes.
english: Yes.

chinese: 所以你找了份工作?
english: So you got a job!

chinese: 不, 我回到商学院学习管理.
english: NO.I went back to business school for management studies.

chinese: 更多的考试!
english: More tests!
